summary: Client requested Jordan to run a test. QA executed the test and confirmed the output matches the expected result; PM, Architect, and Developer did not comment.

decisions.title: QA test passed
decisions.details: QA confirmed the test output 'testing 123' matches the expected result.

sign_offs.what: Approved test result: output matches expected 'testing 123'

actions.task: Run the requested test and confirm results to the client

risks.risk: PM, Architect, and Developer did not address the testing request
risks.mitigation: Follow up with PM, Architect, and Developer to obtain their review/comments and assign any follow-up work if issues are found
